title: Front End Developer
description:
**Job Description – Senior Frontend Developer (7+ years)****Education:**
* Bachelor’s degree in computer science, Information Systems, or a related field, or equivalent work experience.


**Qualifications:*** 7+ years of experience in frontend development.
* Strong proficiency in JavaScript, including DOM manipulation and the JavaScript object model.
* Thorough understanding of React.js and Angular and their core principles. Experience with popular React.js workflows (such as Flux or Redux) and Angular2 + practices and commonly used modules based on extensive work experience.
* Familiarity with newer specifications of ECMAScript.
* Experience with external libraries (e.g., bootstrap, Lodash, Angular Material ).
* Knowledge of modern authorization mechanisms, such as JSON Web Token.
* Familiarity with modern front-end build pipelines and tools.
* Experience with common front-end development tools such as Babel, Webpack, NPM, etc.
* Ability to understand business requirements and translate them into technical requirements.
* A knack for benchmarking and optimization.
* Familiarity with code versioning tools, such as Git.

**Responsibilities:*** Develop new user-facing features using React.js, Angular2+ or other popular frontend libraries/frameworks.
* Build reusable components and front-end libraries for future use.
* Translate designs and wireframes into high-quality code.
* Optimize components for maximum performance across a vast array of web-capable devices and browsers.
* Collaborate with other team members and stakeholders.
* Ensure the technical feasibility of UI/UX designs.
* Conduct code reviews and mentor junior developers.
* Participate in agile development processes in SDLC including sprint planning, iterative development, estimations, and design sessions.

**Nice to Have:*** Understanding of any Database language.
* Familiarity with backend technologies.
* Knowledge of performance testing frameworks including Mocha and Jest.
* Experience with browser-based debugging and performance testing software.
* Excellent troubleshooting skills and project management skill.

title: Front End Developer
description:
On-site
Agency :
Prose On Pixels
Job Description Summary :
Prose on Pixels is a global content at scale agency built to address the marketing challenges of today and deliver meaningful content into the future. With our unique Audience-First production model, we Create, Scale and Personalize content to captivate audiences and achieve desired brand and business outcomes.  

  

Fusing creativity and performance, we create harder working, more sustainable content, reducing waste, and providing stronger ROI.
Job Description :  

JOB DESCRIPTION:  

Our Development Team is an interdisciplinary group of professionals with different creative and technical backgrounds and experience made-up of dev/ops, backend and frontend developers in charge of deliver high quality products such as applications, websites, emails and interactive banners to our clients by following the highest standards and keeping up with latest technology trends.
As a Front End Developer, you will be the person who combines design and technology to code the structure, the logic and required appearance of websites, emails and banners. The frontend developer works closer with project managers and other team members to provide a standardized and attractive product based on its requirements.  

Qualifications
We’re looking for candidates with industry experience in:* At least 4+ years working in digital production projects and teams, preferably in an agency environment.
* Proficient in frontend technologies HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
* Experienced working with software versioning tools such as GIT or SVN.
* Familiar with at least one of the following JavaScript frameworks/libraries: Angular, Vue, React.
* Knowledge of best practices, strategies, and industry standards related to web development.
* Domain of design tools like Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Illustrator, Adobe XD or Sketch.
* Email development experience


Background and Preferred Skill* Bachelor's degree in computer science a preferred
* 4+ years of experience
* CSS/JS/GSAP animations experience
* Frontend CSS pre-compilers such as SCSS
* Knowledge and experience with WordPress, Drupal, AEM or Sitecore.
* Native mobile development or good knowledge of Cordova, CapacitorJs.
* Use of task runners, code processors and npm scripts.
* Backend knowledge of PHP, .NET or NodeJS.
* Testing and debugging skills
* Familiar with SEO, Analytics and Accessibility


Contract Type :
Permanent
Here at Havas across the group we pride ourselves on being committed to offering equal opportunities to all potential employees and have zero tolerance for discrimination. We are an equal opportunity employer and welcome applicants irrespective of age, sex, race, ethnicity, disability and other factors that have no bearing on an individual’s ability to perform their job.

title: Software Engineer
description:
Algoscale is a leader in the field of Big Data Analytics and AI. We’ve successfully delivered 260+ projects for clients from 25+ countries gathering positive feedback along the journey and followed by a large section of the community. **Job Description:**
We are seeking a passionate and skilled React Developer to join our growing team. You will play a key role in designing, developing, and maintaining user interfaces for our web applications and mobile apps using React and related technologies. You will work closely with designers, product managers, and other engineers to bring our vision to life. **Responsibilities:*** Design and develop new user-facing features using React.js.
* Build reusable, maintainable, and performant React components.
* Collaborate with designers to translate wireframes and prototypes into high-quality code.
* Write unit and integration tests to ensure code quality and stability.
* Debug and troubleshoot complex front-end issues.
* Stay up-to-date with the latest trends and best practices in React and the JavaScript ecosystem.
* Contribute to the overall code quality and maintainability of the codebase.
* Participate in code reviews and provide constructive feedback to colleagues.

 **Qualifications:*** At least 2 years of experience working as a React Developer.
* Strong understanding of React concepts, including components, JSX, state management (Redux or Context API), and hooks.
* Proficient in JavaScript (ES6+) and related web technologies (HTML, CSS).
* Experience with unit testing frameworks (Jest, Mocha) and testing methodologies (TDD, BDD).
* Excellent problem-solving and debugging skills.
* Strong communication and collaboration skills.
* Ability to work independently and as part of a team.
* Passion for building high-quality, user-friendly web applications.
* Bonus points for experience with server-side rendering (Next.js, Gatsby), state management libraries (Redux, MobX), and styling libraries (Material-UI, Tailwind CSS).

 **What we offer:*** Flexible working hours and mode. Work from home, remote, and Hybrid. (Available for some positions only)
* Opportunity to collaborate with leading companies across the globe.
* Work with an exceptionally talented team.
* Opportunity with the latest and trending technologies. No analog stuff.
* Employee benefits such as competitive base salary, bonuses, group health insurance, skill development program, and recognition program.

title: Mern Stack Fresher
description:
### **Job Description**


**Position Overview:**  

We are seeking a highly motivated and talented MERN Stack Developer to join our dynamic team as a fresher. This is an excellent opportunity for individuals with a passion for web development using the MERN (MongoDB, Express.js, React, Node.js) stack. As a MERN Stack Developer, you will work closely with our experienced development team to build and maintain cutting-edge web applications.

**Key Responsibilities:**

**Front-end Development:** Collaborate with UI/UX designers to implement responsive and user-friendly web interfaces using React.js.

**Back-end Development:** Work on server-side logic using Node.js and Express.js to ensure seamless integration with the front-end.

**Database Management**:\\*\\* Utilize MongoDB for database design and management, including data modeling and query optimization.

**API Development:** Build and maintain robust RESTful APIs to facilitate data exchange between the front-end and back-end components.

**Code Testing:** Conduct unit testing and debugging to ensure the quality and reliability of the application code.

**Collaboration:** Work closely with cross-functional teams, including designers, product managers, and other developers, to deliver high-quality software solutions.

**Qualifications:**


Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field.


Strong understanding of web development concepts and principles.


Knowledge of the MERN stack and its components (MongoDB, Express.js, React, Node.js).


Familiarity with version control systems, preferably Git.


Basic understanding of front-end technologies such as HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.


Excellent problem-solving and communication skills.

**Assessment:**


To be shortlisted for this position, candidates are required to complete a comprehensive MERN Stack development assessment. MERN Stack Fresher


### **Required Job Skill Sets**


* node
* react
* javaScript
* css
### **Employment Type**


Full Time


### **Salary**


12K - 25K INR

In Office


**Location**


201&202, Om shopping center, Nilje, Palava City


Dombivli, 421204


Maharashtra, India

title: Full Stack Developer
description:
**Job Category:** Developer
**Job Type:** Full Time
**Job Location:** Noida - India
CLOUDSUFI is a Data Science and Product Engineering organization building Products and Solutions for Technology and Enterprise industries. We firmly believe in the power of data to transform businesses and make better decisions. We combine unmatched experience in business processes with cutting edge infrastructure and cloud services. We partner with our customers to monetize their data and make enterprise data dance.


CLOUDSUFI is seeking a **Full stack developer to** produce scalable software solutions. You’ll be part of a cross-functional team that’s responsible for the full software development life cycle, from conception to deployment. As a Full Stack Developer, you should be comfortable around both front-end and back-end coding languages, development frameworks and third-party libraries.


**Responsibilities**


* Develop assigned components / classes and assist team in E2E development
* Participate in Daily Scrum calls, Scrum Planning, Retro and Demos meetings
* Bring out technical/design/architectural challenges/risks during execution, develop action plan for mitigation and aversion of identified risks
* Comply with development processes, documentation templates and tools prescribed by CloudSufi or and its clients
* Work with other teams and Architects in the organization and assist them on technical Issues/Demos/POCs and proposal writing for prospective clients
* Contribute towards the creation of knowledge repository, reusable assets/solution accelerators and IPs
* Provide feedback to junior developers and be a coach and mentor for them


**Required Experience:**


* Experience with healthcare domain related applications.
* Previous experience working as a react.js & Node api developer.
	+ Node js with REST API
	+ Knowledge of REACT tools including React.js, Webpack, Enzyme, Redux, and Flux.
* Experience with Google Cloud managing and deploying applications
* In-depth knowledge of JavaScript, CSS, HTML, and front-end languages.
* Experience with user interface design.
* Strong experience in building APIs using Node
* Excellent troubleshooting skills.
* Must have integration component development experience using Javascript / Typescript language.
* Should have good hands-on experience with Software Engineering tools viz. JIRA, Confluence, BitBucket, SVN etc.


**Non-Technical/ Behavioral competencies required:**


* Must have worked with US/Europe based clients in onsite/offshore delivery model
* Should have very good verbal and written communication, technical articulation, listening and presentation skills
* Should have proven analytical and problem solving skills
* Should have demonstrated effective task prioritization, time management and internal/external stakeholder management skills
* Should be a quick learner, self starter, go-getter and team player
* Should have experience of working under stringent deadlines in a Matrix organization structure

* Proficiency in SQL and database design.
* Experience with building and consuming RESTful APIs.

Come work at a place where innovation and teamwork come together to support the most exciting missions in the world!
Qualys is seeking a Senior Front-end Engineer to join our team. As a Senior Front-end Engineer, you'll be tasked with creating modern, intuitive, data-driven interfaces for our multiple web-based SaaS products. We’re looking for someone who is passionate about front-end technologies and who enjoys the unique responsibility of helping to define the customer experience.  

  

Responsibilities  

  

Coding! You will collaborate with a UX/UI designer and other front-end and middle-tier engineers to design, prototype, and build complex cloud-based security applications. You will assist other developers with integration of UI components with backend logic, interface implementation, and troubleshooting. Of course supporting the existing UI is a must, however, there will be plenty of opportunities to create solutions for advanced functionality while making improvements to existing areas of the application, as well as with new features.  

  

Qualifications* 5 years front-end development experience.
* The fundamentals: HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Must have an excellent understanding of the browser DOM.
* You’re a JavaScript expert! Firm grasp of lexical scoping, closures, and OO JavaScript. Proficient in native JavaScript as well as one or more frameworks such as ReactJS, etc.
* Ability to bring Photoshop designs to life with near pixel-perfect accuracy.
* Proficient with debugging and testing tools to troubleshoot and optimize the UI.
* Understanding of accessibility, 508 compliance.
* Experienced in building Responsive UI Understanding of front-end security best practices and XSS, CSRF, etc.

title: Developer
description:

As a Laravel Developer, you will be responsible for developing, testing, and maintaining web applications using Laravel framework. The ideal candidate will have a strong understanding of Laravel and a passion for delivering high-quality products.**Responsibilities and Duties:**
--------------------------------

* Develop and maintain web applications using Laravel framework
* Write clean, maintainable, and efficient code
* Collaborate with team members to solve complex problems
* Test and debug applications to ensure high-quality delivery
* Stay current with the latest developments in Laravel and related technologies

-----------------------------

* Strong understanding of Laravel framework
* Familiarity with front-end technologies such as HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
* Ability to write clean, maintainable, and efficient code
* Good understanding of database systems and SQL
* Excellent written and verbal communication skills
* Ability to *work* independently and as part of a team

We offer a supportive and collaborative *work* environment, as well as opportunities for professional growth and development. If you are a talented and driven Laravel Developer, we encourage you to *apply* for this exciting opportunity.

title: Developer
description:
Location: *Surat*.


We are looking for a great JavaScript developer who is proficient with React.js. Your primary focus will be on developing user interface components and implementing them following well-known React.js workflows (such as Flux or Redux). You will ensure that these components and the overall application are robust and easy to maintain. You will coordinate with the rest of the team working on different layers of the infrastructure. Therefore, a commitment to collaborative problem solving, sophisticated design, and quality product is important.

**EXPERIENCE :** Minimum 5+ years experience required

**RESPONSIBILITIES :-**

* Developing new user-facing features using React.js
* Building reusable components and front-end libraries for future use
* Translating designs and wireframes into high quality code
* Optimizing components for maximum performance across a vast array of web-capable devices and browsers

**SKILLS :-**

* Strong proficiency in JavaScript, including DOM manipulation and the JavaScript object model
* Thorough understanding of React.js and its core principles
* Experience with popular React.js workflows (such as Flux or Redux)
* Familiarity with newer specifications of EcmaScript
* Experience with data structure libraries (e.g., Immutable.js)
* Knowledge of isomorphic React is a plus
* Familiarity with RESTful APIs
* Knowledge of modern authorization mechanisms, such as JSON Web Token
* Familiarity with modern front-end build pipelines and tools
* Experience with common front-end development tools such as Babel, Webpack, NPM, etc.
* Ability to understand business requirements and translate them into technical requirements
* A knack for benchmarking and optimization
* Familiarity with code versioning tools (such as Git, SVN, and Mercurial)


Apply Now

description:

We are looking for an experienced and passionate **WordPress Developer** to join our IT team! title: User Interface Designer
description:
At DuPont, we are working on things that matter; whether it’s providing clean water to more than a billion people on the planet, producing materials that are essential in everyday technology devices from smartphones to electric vehicles, or protecting workers around the world.


If you would like to be a part of a premier multi-industrial company that is delivering sustainable solutions that bring real purpose and value, of a company with collaborative spirit because it believes that we work best when we work together as a team and values the diversity of thought, then DuPont is the company for you!

**WHY JOIN US?**

**Our purpose is to empower the world with essential innovations to thrive. We work on things that matter!**


Have the **Opportunity** to chart your own course, challenge yourself, and acquire new capabilities to build a rewarding and fulfilling career. We reward employees with competitive pay and incentives to recognize skills, competencies, and contributions to business results.


Get to **Experience** a collaborative environment where teamwork is celebrated with flexibility that enhances balance and an inclusive atmosphere that is welcoming to all!


Get to know our **Purpose** and make it yours by bringing innovations to market that improve the world, share a commitment to sustainability that makes our planet better and give back to communities in which we work and live.


Job Description UI/UX Designer  

  

DuPont Water Solutions (DWS) is on a digital transformation journey to design and develop innovative digital products and services that drive value for customers and other stakeholders. This includes using connecting plants using IOT and leveraging AI/ML to deliver descriptive, diagnostic, predictive and prescriptive analytics. We are looking for future leaders who are willing to take roll up their sleeves and define, design, and develop the next generation products and services that will power innovation and growth for DWS.  

  

We are looking for a Product Designer who can transform our software into user-friendly products that delight our clients. Product Designer responsibilities include gathering user requirements, designing graphic elements and building navigation components. We're looking for individuals who are well-versed in the latest industry trends, emerging design patterns, and ever-evolving technologies. If you have a portfolio of professional design projects that include work with web/mobile applications, we’d like to meet you. Ultimately, you’ll create both functional and appealing features that address our clients’ needs and help us grow our customer base.  

  

Objectives of the role:


Gather and evaluate user requirements in collaboration with product managers and engineers. Conduct user research to understand needs, behaviors, and pain points of users through interviews, surveys, and observations. Organize and structure content and information logically, ensuring easy navigation. Identify and troubleshoot UX problems for existing products. Conceptualize and illustrate ideas using storyboards, process flows and sitemaps. Create mockups, wireframes, and interactive prototypes to visualize the layout and functionality of digital products. Craft visually pleasing interfaces and graphic designs, including choosing colors, typography, icons, and imagery, while maintaining consistency with branding guidelines. Develop and maintain Design Library including extensive list of UI components and patterns. Conduct usability tests to gather feedback and iterate on designs for improved user satisfaction. Define how users interact with the product, including the placement and behavior of interactive elements. Work closely with cross-functional teams, such as developers and product managers, to ensure designs align with technical feasibility and business goals. Design interfaces that adapt seamlessly to different screen sizes and devices. Create user guides, documentation, and in-app help and take in charge on interface content.


Skills:

* 6-8 years of proven work experience as a Product Designer or similar role.
* A strong portfolio showcasing previous design work, including web/mobile applications, design process, problem-solving abilities, and creativity.
* Proficiency in design software and prototyping tool such as Adobe Creative Suite (e.g., Photoshop, Illustrator, XD) Figma, Sketch etc.
* Knowledge of user-centered design principles, typography, color theory, and layout are essential.
* Strong team spirit and communication skills to collaborate with various stakeholders. Effective time management skills to meet project deadlines and handle multiple tasks efficiently.
* A basic understanding of front-end development can be beneficial. A keen eye for detail to ensure that designs are pixel-perfect and consistent.


Education Qualification:

**B.Des / M.Des** Degree is mandatory.


Join our Talent Community to stay connected with us!


DuPont is an equal opportunity employer. Qualified applicants will be considered without regard to race, color, religion, creed, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, marital status, national origin, age, veteran status, disability or any other protected class. If you need a reasonable accommodation to search or apply for a position, please visit our Accessibility Page for Contact Information.

Full time**Type Of Hire :**

5+ years of professional experience in Java/J2EE applications.


Expertise in Core Java, Spring Boot, Spring MVC, Restful Web Services, Spring ORM, Databases (Oracle, DB2).

Good to know about DevOps and Cloud

* Should have good experience in OOPS concepts, Design patterns, Collection frameworks
* Strong in multiple front-end languages and libraries (HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Typescript, XML, jQuery)
* Experience in Angular 8+ UI framework

and UI/UX design

* Loans, Deposit, Customer Information System

**Educational Qualification**: • BE / MCA (or) Equivalent degree

**Added Bonus** if you have:

* Knowledge of FIS’ products and services
* Knowledge of banking or Financial services industry

**What we offer you:**

* A range of benefits designed to help support your lifestyle and wellbeing
* A multi-faceted job with a broad spectrum of responsibilities
* A modern international work environment and a dedicated and innovative team


A broad range of professional education and personal development possibilities – FIS is your final career step

**Privacy Statement**


FIS is committed to protecting the privacy and security of all personal information that we process in order to provide services to our clients. For specific information on how FIS protects personal information online, please see the Online Privacy Notice.

**Sourcing Model**


Recruitment at FIS works primarily on a direct sourcing model; a relatively small portion of our hiring is through recruitment agencies. FIS does not accept resumes from recruitment agencies which are not on the preferred supplier list and is not responsible for any related fees for resumes submitted to job postings, our employees, or any other part of our company.

title: Senior Software Engineer
description:
**Job Summary**


We are seeking a talented full stack web applications developer to join our team. You’ll be part of the UK Building Services Engineering team based in India in either our Bengaluru or Noida office and part of a wider ‘Digital Engineering & Automation team’. The ideal candidate should have experience in developing modern, responsive web applications.

**Responsibilities:**

* Work closely various stakeholders to understand and develop business requirements.
* Develop responsive web applications using Svelte via Svelte Kit / Blazor.
* Updating and maintaining the software after deployment.
* Work in a continuous delivery environment, writing production ready code.
* Optimize web applications for maximum speed and scalability.
* Ensure the technical feasibility of UI/UX designs. Create reusable code and libraries for future use.
* Integrating with third-party APIs and existing frameworks
* Contribute towards software and database design and understand and provide architecture recommendations.
* Collaborate with other team members and stakeholders to ensure the delivery of high-quality projects.

**Requirements:**

* Software development experience in web and cloud technology
* Proficiency in Node.js, ASP.NET/C# (Blazor), python and similar technologies.
* Familiarity with front-end frameworks such as Svelte, CSS
* Proficiency in SQL / Postgres database
* Knowledge of version control using git, preferably GitHub.
* Knowledge of Rest API
* Excellent understanding of geometries, vectors, 3D objects, spatial systems, and coordinates.
* Excellent communication and interpersonal skills and problem solving.

**Nice-to-Have:**

* Working experience with Autodesk Platform Services and/or Autodesk product Api.
* Experience with using Azure.


If you are a talented full stack web developer looking to join a dynamic and growing team, we encourage you to apply.

title: Full Stack Developer
description:
**Project** **Description**
---------------------------


We are seeking a highly skilled .NET Full Stack Developer with expertise in React JS and C#. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in software development, experience with .NET technologies, and proficiency in utilizing microservices for building scalable and robust applications.


**Responsibilities**
--------------------


+ Design, develop, and maintain efficient and scalable web applications using .NET technologies.
+ Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and implement new features.
+ Utilize C# programming language to implement server-side logic.
+ Develop responsive user interfaces using React JS for seamless user experiences.
+ Implement and maintain microservices architecture for improved system scalability and flexibility.
+ Collaborate with front-end developers to integrate user-facing elements with server-side logic.
+ Optimize applications for maximum speed and scalability.
+ Troubleshoot, debug, and resolve software defects and issues.
+ Stay updated on industry trends and advancements in web development technologies.
**Skills**
----------


Must have


+ Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field.
+ 9+ years of proven experience as a .NET Full Stack Developer or similar role for 4+ years
+ Strong proficiency in .NET framework and C# programming language.
+ Experience with React JS for building responsive and interactive user interfaces.
+ Familiarity with microservices architecture and its implementation.
+ Solid understanding of web development best practices, design patterns, and architecture.
+ Experience with database systems, both relational (e.g., SQL Server) and non-relational (e.g., MongoDB).
+ Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
+ Excellent communication and collaboration skills.
+ Ability to work effectively in a fast-paced and dynamic environment.

  

If you are passionate about full-stack development and possess the required skills, we invite you to join our team and contribute to the success of our innovative projects.

Nice to have


Good to have:  

+ AWS
+ Hibernate / entity framework
+ Microservices experience

-------------


English: A1 Beginner


**Seniority**
-------------


Senior


**Relocation package**
----------------------


If needed, we can help you with relocation process.

C#/VB.NET

The ideal candidate should have a minimum of 3 years of proven experience in UI/UX design and development, with a strong proficiency in Tailwind CSS and Bootstrap. If you are passionate about creating visually appealing and user-friendly interfaces and have hands-on expertise in modern front-end technologies, we encourage you to apply.

**Key Responsibilities:**

* UI/UX Design:

Create intuitive and visually engaging user interfaces for web applications.

Collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand project requirements and user needs.

* Front-End Development:

Translate design concepts into clean and efficient front-end code.

Implement responsive and mobile-friendly designs using Tailwind CSS and Bootstrap.

* User Research:

Conduct user research and gather feedback to enhance user experiences.

Iterate on designs based on user testing and feedback.

* Prototyping:

Develop interactive prototypes for user testing and stakeholder feedback.

* Code Optimization:

Ensure code is optimized for performance and adheres to best practices.

Collaborate with back-end developers to integrate front-end components seamlessly.

**Requirements:**

* Minimum of 3 years of professional experience as a UI/UX Developer.
* Hands-on experience with Tailwind CSS and Bootstrap.
* Proficient in HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript.
* Experience with design tools such as Adobe XD, Sketch, or Figma.
* Strong understanding of user-centered design principles and best practices.
* Knowledge of front-end frameworks like React or Vue.js is a plus.
* Excellent communication and collaboration skills.
* A portfolio showcasing previous UI/UX design and development projects

Please submit your resume to info-calicut@tranetech.com

For more details contact +91 90742 89496

description:
We are seeking a skilled Laravel Developer with 2-3 years of experience to join our dynamic and innovative development team. As a Laravel Developer, you will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining web applications using the Laravel PHP framework. Your expertise will play a crucial role in delivering high-quality, scalable, and robust web solutions for our clients.

Responsibilities:

* · Develop and maintain web applications using the Laravel framework.
* · Collaborate with the development team to design and implement features and functionalities for web projects.
* · Write clean, efficient, and well-documented code adhering to best practices and coding standards.
* · Participate in code reviews to ensure code quality and offer constructive feedback to team members.
* · Identify and troubleshoot issues, bugs, and performance bottlenecks and propose appropriate solutions.
* · Integrate data from various sources and databases into the web application.
* · Optimize applications for maximum speed and scalability.
* · Work closely with frontend developers to ensure seamless integration between the frontend and backend components.
* · Implement security measures to protect data and application integrity.
* · Stay up-to-date with the latest industry trends, technologies, and best practices related to web development and Laravel.

Requirements:

* · 2-3 years of professional experience in developing web applications and APIs using Laravel.
* · Proficient in PHP and object-oriented programming concepts.
* · Strong understanding of Laravel's architecture and MVC design pattern.
* · Experience with relational databases like MySQL, including database design and optimization.
* · Familiarity with front-end technologies such as HTML, CSS, and JavaScript/jQuery.
* · Knowledge of version control systems (e.g., Git) and deployment processes.
* · Ability to work collaboratively in a team environment and communicate effectively.
* · A problem-solving mindset and the ability to think critically to devise innovative solutions.
* · Solid understanding of web security principles and best practices.

description:

title: Software Engineer
description:
**About the company**

Pinnacle Seven is seeking a skilled and passionate Software Engineer with experience in Python Django to join our development team. As a Software Engineer, you will contribute to the design, development, and maintenance of our web-based applications using Python and Django framework. Your expertise will play a crucial role in delivering high-quality, scalable, and efficient software solutions.

**Roles and responsibilities**

* Collaborate with the development team to design, develop, and implement web applications using Python Django.
* Write clean, maintainable, and efficient code to deliver robust and scalable solutions.
* Participate in the architectural design and decision-making processes to ensure the development of reliable and scalable software solutions.
* Apply best practices and design patterns to create modular and reusable code.
* Design and optimize database schemas, queries, and operations to ensure efficient data storage and retrieval.
* Work with SQL and NoSQL databases to integrate and manage data within the application.
* Write unit tests and perform thorough testing to ensure the quality, performance, and reliability of the developed software.
* Collaborate with quality assurance engineers to identify and resolve any defects or issues.
* Participate in code reviews and provide constructive feedback to fellow team members.
* Collaborate closely with cross-functional teams, including designers, product managers, and other developers, to ensure smooth project execution and timely delivery.
* Stay up-to-date with emerging technologies, trends, and best practices in software development.
* Continuously enhance your skills and knowledge to contribute to the improvement of the team's development processes and standards.
* Create and maintain technical documentation, including design specifications, API documentation, and user guides.
* Ensure clear and concise documentation to facilitate seamless knowledge transfer and onboarding.
* Assist in troubleshooting and resolving issues in the production environment.
* Provide support and guidance to end-users and technical support teams as needed.

**Requirement**

* Proven experience as a Software Engineer, with a minimum of 2 years of experience, specifically with Python and Django.
* Strong knowledge and hands-on experience in web development using Django framework.
* Proficiency in Python programming language and understanding of its best practices and principles.
* Experience with front-end technologies such as HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
* Familiarity with database technologies like PostgreSQL, MySQL, or MongoDB.
* Knowledge of software development methodologies, version control systems (e.g., Git), and issue tracking systems (e.g., Jira).
* Solid understanding of object-oriented programming (OOP) concepts.
* Strong problem-solving and analytical skills, with a focus on delivering efficient and effective solutions.
* Excellent communication and collaboration skills, with the ability to work effectively in a team-oriented environment.
* Experience with Agile software development methodologies, such as Scrum or Kanban.
* Knowledge of software security best practices and experience implementing security measures in web applications.

**Preferred Qualification**

* Master's or Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field.
* Any certification related to the skillsets will be an advantage.

Interested can share updated resume to **neeraja@pinnacleseven.com** for further discussion.

title: Full Stack Developer
description:
**Who are we looking for? Full Stack Developer**

**What’s the story?** 

In India, there are more than 453+ million migrants. Less than 2% of this cohort uses mobile payments to send money home. While penetration of UPI and digital banking hit the ceiling, this invisible workforce that powers most of Bharat is still stuck in a cash economy and remains underbanked. **branchX is India's first neobank enabling empathetic banking for migrant communities.** Building banking that is meaningfully accessible to every aspiring Indian goes beyond the 9-5 bustle. If you are someone who derives fulfillment from purpose-led work with the ability to experiment, innovate, fail and iterate, branchX is the playground for you.

**Location: Bangalore**

**About Us:**

Launched in June 2020, branchX is India's first neo-banking solution, enabling empathetic banking for migrant communities. Our vision is to transform the way underbanked communities manage money with a ‘hand-holding grid’ aided by intelligent technologies. Headquartered in Navi-Mumbai, we are a 100+ member impact-driven team with offices in Noida, Bangalore, Kochi, Tamil Nadu, Kolkata and other locations.

**Where do you come into the picture?** 

A highly motivated and experienced Full Stack Developer who will produce scalable software solutions. The individual should be comfortable with both front-end and back-end coding languages, development frameworks, and third-party libraries.

**What would a day in your life @ branchX look like?** 

* Work with development teams and product managers to ideate software solutions
* Design client-side and server-side architecture
* Build the front-end of applications through appealing visual design
* Develop and manage well-functioning databases and applications
* Write effective APIs
* Test software to ensure responsiveness and efficiency
* Troubleshoot, debug and upgrade software
* Create security and data protection settings
* Build features and applications with a mobile responsive design
* Write technical documentation
* Work with data scientists and analysts to improve software

**Desirables:**

* Proven experience of 4-5 years as a Full Stack Developer.
* Should be excellent in Python and PHP.
* Experience developing desktop and mobile applications.
* Familiarity with common stacks
* Knowledge of multiple front-end languages and libraries (e.g. HTML/ CSS, JavaScript, XML, jQuery)
* Knowledge of multiple back-end languages (e.g. C#, Java, Python) and JavaScript frameworks (e.g. Angular, React, Node.js)
* Familiarity with databases (e.g. MySQL, MongoDB), web servers (e.g. Apache), and UI/UX design
* Excellent communication and teamwork skills.
* Organizational skills
* Degree in Computer Science, Statistics or a relevant field.

**What expertise & experiences would you need to have to play this kind of role?** 

A strong leader who can adapt to cross-functional teams that are responsible for the full software development life cycle, from conception to deployment.

**Core Value** 

‘Empathy’ as a term has become a buzzword. At branchX, we are constantly reimagining what empathy means in action. While we are finding new ways of translating empathy at work and on the ground, we do know that it goes beyond the extension of feeling 'something' for an individual. We are combining empathy and action to uplift underbanked communities. What does this mean for you? It means you’ll be part of co-creating products for the masses. Products that are meaningfully accessed by the underserved and will directly boost India’s economy in the long term. If indulging in blue-sky thinking, innovating, and iterating to create grassroots impact makes you tickle.

title: Tooling Engineer
description:
**Job Description**
-------------------

  

Job Description

* Develops, test and support Design Automation flow for RTL front end design in areas related to


o RTL Lint


o CDC/RDC


o Glitch/Open Latch


o Low Power Validation


o Simulation


o Formal Verification


o Emulation/FPGA


o Design Debug


o Synthesis/DFT


o Power Estimation


o Constraint Validation


o Equivalence Check

* Consult SoC development projects to ensure proper usage and availability of Design system infrastructure and methods.
* Pro-actively driving the continuous improvement of the flows
* Understanding specification, implementation, testing, release, and support of the design flow infrastructure components.
* Propose, evaluate, and integrate new features of Data-management (Perforce/ Git /DesignSync) in Design Flow for better integration of EDA tools.
* Evaluate the existing legacy in-house tools in use to Re-architect them using software best practices and technologies to make them faster, leaner, modular, maintainable etc.
* Work with Infra lead & flow users to understand design flow challenges and come up with innovative ideas/solutions to resolve them
* Support by providing training documents on Flow Infrastructure software to designers, flow developers and support engineers
* Ensuring compliance with all Quality/Process practices in s/w development.

**Qualifications**
------------------

  

Profile

* 2+ years of experience in the areas of Software programming, EDA tool development and cloud computing
* BE / BTech / MS in Computer Science / Electronics
* Any certification in cloud computing or associated experience is desired. Prior expertise in containerization , load sharing like LSF helps,
* Strong knowledge of Object Oriented Perl Programming
* Experience with any EDA tool development in infrastructure/flow
* Expertise in process automation using scripting (Perl/Python/Tcl)
* Good SW debugging skills
* Ability to work independently

**Inside this Business Group**
------------------------------

  

In the Design Engineering Group (DEG), we take pride in developing the best-in-class SOCs, Cores, and IPs that power Intel’s products. From development, to integration, validation, and manufacturing readiness, our mission is to deliver leadership products through the pursuit of Moore’s Law and groundbreaking innovations. DEG is Intel’s engineering group, supplying silicon to business units as well as other engineering teams. As a critical provider of all Intel products, DEG leadership has a responsibility to ensure the delivery of these products in a cost efficient and effective manner.  

**Other Locations**
-------------------

  

IN, Hyderabad  

**Posting Statement**
---------------------

  

All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, religious creed, sex, national origin, ancestry, age, physical or mental disability, medical condition, genetic information, military and veteran status, marital status, pregnancy, gender, gender expression, gender identity, sexual orientation, or any other characteristic protected by local law, regulation, or ordinance.  

**Benefits**
------------

  

We offer a total compensation package that ranks among the best in the industry. It consists of competitive pay, stock, bonuses, as well as, benefit programs which include health, retirement, and vacation. Find more information about all of our Amazing Benefits here.  

  

It has come to our notice that some people have received fake job interview letters ostensibly issued by Intel, inviting them to attend interviews in Intel’s offices for various positions and further requiring them to deposit money to be eligible for the interviews. We wish to bring to your notice that these letters are not issued by Intel or any of its authorized representatives. Hiring at Intel is based purely on merit and Intel does not ask or require candidates to deposit any money. We would urge people interested in working for Intel, to apply directly at https://jobs.intel.com/ and not fall prey to unscrupulous elements.  

**Working Model**
-----------------

  

This role will be eligible for our hybrid work model which allows employees to split their time between working on-site at their assigned Intel site and off-site. **In certain circumstances the work model may change to accommodate business needs.**  

JobType


Hybrid

title: Software Engineer
description:
**JOB DESCRIPTION**  

We have an exciting and rewarding opportunity for you to take your software engineering career to the next level.


As a T24 Developer Software Engineer III at JPMorgan Chase within the Corporate & Investment Bank Payments Technology Team, you serve as a seasoned member of an agile team to design and deliver trusted market-leading technology products in a secure, stable, and scalable way. You are responsible for carrying out critical technology solutions across multiple technical areas within various business functions in support of the firm’s business objectives.

**Job responsibilities**

* Executes software solutions, design, development, and technical troubleshooting with ability to think beyond routine or conventional approaches to build solutions or break down technical problems
* Creates secure and high-quality production code and maintains algorithms that run synchronously with appropriate systems
* Produces architecture and design artifacts for complex applications while being accountable for ensuring design constraints are met by software code development
* Gathers, analyzes, synthesizes, and develops visualizations and reporting from large, diverse data sets in service of continuous improvement of software applications and systems
* Proactively identifies hidden problems and patterns in data and uses these insights to drive improvements to coding hygiene and system architecture
* Contributes to software engineering communities of practice and events that explore new and emerging technologies
* Adds to team culture of diversity, equity, inclusion, and respect

**Required qualifications, capabilities, and skills**

* Formal training or certification on software engineering concepts and 3+ years applied experience
* Hands-on practical experience in system design, application development, testing, and operational stability
* In-depth knowledge of the Temenos T24 Banking Application, focusing on; Interest, Tax, Swift Payments, Accounting, Reporting, Sweeps and Close of Business processing.
* Strong knowledge of modern programming languages such as; SQL programming, Java, API development.
* Knowledge of application, data and infrastructure architecture disciplines.
* Strong experience of end to end application design and development.
* In-depth knowledge of T24 Code Deployment, Packaging, UAT Support, Non-Functional Testing principals.
* Ability to analyze and resolve technical and application issues.
* Strong knowledge of UNIX/LINUX, Oracle Database, Temenos Web Services (TWS), TAFJ preferred and TCserver.
* Demonstrated knowledge of software applications and technical processes within a technical discipline (e.g., cloud, artificial intelligence, machine learning, mobile, etc.)

**Preferred qualifications, capabilities, and skills**

* Familiarity with modern front-end technologies
* Exposure to cloud technologies


**ABOUT US**  

JPMorgan Chase & Co., one of the oldest financial institutions, offers innovative financial solutions to millions of consumers, small businesses and many of the world’s most prominent corporate, institutional and government clients under the J.P. Morgan and Chase brands. Our history spans over 200 years and today we are a leader in investment banking, consumer and small business banking, commercial banking, financial transaction processing and asset management.  

  

We recognize that our people are our strength and the diverse talents they bring to our global workforce are directly linked to our success. We are an equal opportunity employer and place a high value on diversity and inclusion at our company. We do not discriminate on the basis of any protected attribute, including race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity, gender expression, age, marital or veteran status, pregnancy or disability, or any other basis protected under applicable law. title: Software Engineer
description:
**JOB DESCRIPTION**  

We have an exciting and rewarding opportunity for you to take your software engineering career to the next level.


As a Software Engineer III at JPMorgan Chase within the Infrastructure Platforms team, you serve as a seasoned member of an agile team to design and deliver trusted market-leading technology products in a secure, stable, and scalable way. You are responsible for carrying out critical technology solutions across multiple technical areas within various business functions in support of the firm’s business objectives.




**Job responsibilities**




* Executes software solutions, design, development, and technical troubleshooting with ability to think beyond routine or conventional approaches to build solutions or break down technical problems
* Creates secure and high-quality production code and maintains algorithms that run synchronously with appropriate systems
* Produces architecture and design artifacts for complex applications while being accountable for ensuring design constraints are met by software code development
* Gathers, analyzes, synthesizes, and develops visualizations and reporting from large, diverse data sets in service of continuous improvement of software applications and systems
* Proactively identifies hidden problems and patterns in data and uses these insights to drive improvements to coding hygiene and system architecture
* Contributes to software engineering communities of practice and events that explore new and emerging technologies
* Adds to team culture of diversity, equity, inclusion, and respect




**Required qualifications, capabilities, and skills**




* Formal training or certification on software engineering concepts and 3+ years applied experience
* Hands-on practical experience in system design, application development, testing, and operational stability
* Proficient in coding in one or more languages in JavaScript ,HTML, CSS, Glide APIs
* Experience in developing, debugging, and maintaining code in a large corporate environment with one or more modern programming languages and database querying languages
* Overall knowledge of the Software Development Life Cycle
* Solid understanding of agile methodologies such as CI/CD, Applicant Resiliency, and Security
* Demonstrated knowledge of software applications and technical processes within a technical discipline (e.g., cloud, artificial intelligence, machine learning, mobile, etc.)
* Hands-on experience in implementation and customization of minimum two ServiceNow Modules
* Expertise in creating custom Business rules, Client-Scripts, Script Includes, ACL's, Email Notifications, Complex flows using both Workflows and Flow Designers
* Has experience working on System Integrations with ServiceNow and other Third Party tools using REST Methods
* Certified System Administrator and Certified Implementation Specialist in any ServiceNow Module




**Preferred qualifications, capabilities, and skills**




* Familiarity with modern front-end technologies
* Exposure to cloud technologies




**ABOUT US**  

JPMorgan Chase & Co., one of the oldest financial institutions, offers innovative financial solutions to millions of consumers, small businesses and many of the world’s most prominent corporate, institutional and government clients under the J.P. Morgan and Chase brands. Our history spans over 200 years and today we are a leader in investment banking, consumer and small business banking, commercial banking, financial transaction processing and asset management.  

  

We recognize that our people are our strength and the diverse talents they bring to our global workforce are directly linked to our success. We are an equal opportunity employer and place a high value on diversity and inclusion at our company. We do not discriminate on the basis of any protected attribute, including race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity, gender expression, age, marital or veteran status, pregnancy or disability, or any other basis protected under applicable law. We also make reasonable accommodations for applicants’ and employees’ religious practices and beliefs, as well as mental health or physical disability needs. Visit our FAQs for more information about requesting an accommodation.

  

  

  

**ABOUT THE TEAM**  

  

The Cybersecurity & Technology Controls group at JPMorgan Chase aligns the firm’s cybersecurity, access management, controls and resiliency teams. The group proactively and strategically partners with all lines of business and functions to enable them to design, adopt and integrate appropriate controls; deliver processes and solutions efficiently and consistently; and drive automation of controls. The group’s number one priority is to enable the business by keeping the firm safe, stable and resilient.  

  

High Risk Roles (HRR) are sensitive roles within the technology organization that require high assurance of the integrity of staff by virtue of 1) sensitive cybersecurity and technology functions they perform within systems or 2) information they receive regarding sensitive cybersecurity or technology matters. Users in these roles are subject to enhanced pre-hire screening which includes both criminal and credit background checks (as allowed by law). The enhanced screening will need to be successfully completed prior to commencing employment or assignment.

title: Senior Software Engineer
description:
**JOB DESCRIPTION**  

You’re ready to gain the skills and experience needed to grow within your role and advance your career — and we have the perfect software engineering opportunity for you.


As an Automation Software Engineer II at JPMorgan Chase within the Corporate & Investment Bank Payments Technology Team, you are part of an agile team that works to enhance, design, and deliver the software components of the firm’s state-of-the-art technology products in a secure, stable, and scalable way. As an emerging member of a software engineering team, you execute software solutions through the design, development, and technical troubleshooting of multiple components within a technical product, application, or system, while gaining the skills and experience needed to grow within your role.

**Job responsibilities**

* Executes standard software solutions, design, development, and technical troubleshooting
* Writes secure and high-quality code using the syntax of at least one programming language with limited guidance
* Designs, develops, codes, and troubleshoots with consideration of upstream and downstream systems and technical implications
* Applies knowledge of tools within the Software Development Life Cycle toolchain to improve the value realized by automation
* Applies technical troubleshooting to break down solutions and solve technical problems of basic complexity
* Gathers, analyzes, and draws conclusions from large, diverse data sets to identify problems and contribute to decision-making in service of secure, stable application development
* Learns and applies system processes, methodologies, and skills for the development of secure, stable code and systems
* Adds to team culture of diversity, equity, inclusion, and respect

**Required qualifications, capabilities, and skills**

* Formal training or certification on software engineering concepts and 2+ years applied experience
* Hands-on practical experience in system design, application development, testing, and operational stability
* Automation Using Cucumber, Cypress, Selenium. Database - oracle
* Ability to customize BDD/Selenium in various integrations
* Knowledge and ability to design, build maintain test automation framework
* Automation/functional Test preparation, test design, execution and reporting

* Emerging knowledge of software applications and technical processes within a technical discipline (e.g., cloud, artificial intelligence, machine learning, mobile, etc.)
